snippet.title: Life as an International Actress - Amber Williams (Tamar) from The Chosen | Part 1
snippet.description:
Amber Shana Williams is an actress who portrays Tamar on 'The Chosen'. Since she travels back and forth between the US 🇺🇸 and Spain 🇪🇸 for her career, it was fun to have a chat with her to gain more insight into what travelling as an actress and the acting world is like. 

This conversation was deep and filled with so many gems so it was broken into two parts. Catch part 2 here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DuelF_zboC0

The Chosen is the first multi-series TV Show about the life of Jesus and His followers. Go ahead and watch Amber and all her amazing cast members on The Chosen here: 
Android: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.vidangel.thechosen&hl=en&gl=US
Apple: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/the-chosen-jesus-tv-show/id1473663873

On this episode of Apryll Wil Talk & Travel, I got the chance to speak with Amber Williams who travels regularly for her career. We got to speak about:
0:00 Introduction 
1:07 How long she has been acting
1:32 Why she decided to become an actress
3:13 Where she is currently located
3:49 How she navigates travelling and acting
7:15 Why she moved to Spain
7:40 Let's talk about The Chosen!
9:14 Travelling and diversity from the past to now
10:43 Tamar is back!
13:58 Working with an international cast
20:23 The perception on black people/people of African descent in Spain
21:27 Racism in Spain
25:00 Travelling should humble you
31:05 What special memory do you have from working on the chosen?
